amendment.description: To provide for a demonstration and certification regarding the use of certain Federal funds.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2381 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 0. Record Vote Number: 274.

action.text: Amendment SA 2381 proposed by Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 2369. (consideration: CR S9758-9759, S9767; text: CR S9759) To provide for a demonstration and certification regarding the use of certain Federal funds.
